product_name: DAKINE Cascade Bike Jersey - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring lightweight, breathable fabric and a relaxed fit, the short-sleeve DAKINE Cascade Bike Jersey is built to keep you cool and comfortable on warm-weather bike rides. Polyester/rayon blend fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly. DAKINE Cascade Bike Jersey features a handy interior eyewear chamois for wiping down sunglasses. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring lightweight, breathable fabric and a relaxed fit, the short-sleeve DAKINE Cascade Bike Jersey is built to keep you cool and comfortable on warm-weather bike rides.
